name: Dima delivers Pancakes with Cheese
description:
Dima, in search of work, gets a job in a pancake shop. You have to deliver pancakes to different parts of this strange world.

System requirements:

Windows 7+ (64 bit), OSX (64 bit), Linux

OpenGL 2.0+

What we have:

 - Small Party RPG Adventure

 - 4 endings (2 neutral, 1 bad, 1 good)

 - Non-linear leveling of characters (I doubt you've seen this)

 - A large number of talkative NPCs

 ! The game is translated into 6 languages: English, Russian, German, Spanish, French and Italian

Everything is created with love, including Models and Sprites.

For statistics:

 ~ 90 lines of dialogue

 ~ 250 lines of translated text

 ~ 70 models

Software used:

 Godot Engine (Code)

 Blender (Models)

 InkScape (Sprites, UI)

 LibreOffice Calc (Game Localization)

 Linux (OS)

If the game has become difficult in places, please describe exactly where you are stuck.

Please like, comment, subscribe!
